Neutral B (Paralyzer).notes: On release, startup is 1 and total frames is 28.

Down B (Flip Jump).notes: Automatic bounce off target has 58 endlag but can end early if you land during it. Invulnerable on frame 3-12. Can transition to Manual kick as early as frame 14.

Flip Jump, Kick.notes: Landing lag only occurs if you land during 59 frame animation or during the bounce after a hit, which is a 49 frame animation

Grab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

Dash Grab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

Pivot Grab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

Pummel.notes: Total frames includes 13 frames of hitlag
